text: Ani graminampaiki kahi asehi aheta, je allahavara ani kayamatacya divasavara imana rakhatata ani je kahi kharca karatata tyala allahace sannidhya ani paigambarancya du'a- prarthanece sadhana manatata. Laksata theva ki tyance he kharca karane, niscita tyancyasathi, allahaci nikatata prapta karanyace sadhana ahe. Tyanna allaha avasya apalya krpa-chatrata dakhala karila. Allaha motha mapha karanara, daya karanara ahe
